title: Tuzigoot National Monument: Collections
body: Collections       American Southwest Virtual Museum The SW Virtual Museum is a great way to check out Tuzigoot's collections before heading to the monument. They even have a virtual tour of the trail, and historic photos! Tuzigoot Museum Collections Collection Summary Archeological artifacts recovered from Tuzigoot and nearby ruins and associated field records. Collection Size 3,158 Facilities Exhibiting Museum Items Visitor Center
